NEW YORK
WORLD’S FAIR 1939
39-N cSgjfc. 114
CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
WORTH 2-5600
January 31, 1940
Mr. Frank E. Schooley, Executive Secretary,
The National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois.
My dear Frank*
I have my doubts about Brimberg appearing because he, himself
isn’t sold on the whole Armstrong business.
I don*t think it is necessary to make a formal engineering
appearance.
It might be advisable for some general statement to be made
about the interest of the Educational Groups in regards to any possible
allocation of new bands.
Sincerely yours,
MSN/cb
“New York City’s Own Station”—810 Kc.
